post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
I worked on the model tonight and just checked in the code in CVS (COSKA_MySchool_Model).

I plan to write a few sample JUnit test cases hopefully in a day or two. The JUnit test cases will test model API and persistence through Hibernate mappings. Initially all of the persistence code will be failing and this is intentional.

Hopefully someone would finished up the entire JUnit test suite while I work on Hibernate mapping files to make the test cases pass.
post.title: Initial model code checked in
